function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shift in energy consumption from commercial buildings to homes due to COVID-19 lifestyle changes","Impact":"Strain on energy supply and billing systems, potential for overloading residential energy infrastructure","Mitigation":"Optimize energy supply and billing based on occupancy profiles, and invest in renewable energy resources","Technologies":"Smart home energy management systems, time series analysis, reinforcement learning","People":"Residential energy consumers","Owner":"Energy sector stakeholders"},{"Description":"Smart buildings and robots must grasp spatial indoor topology, semantics, and dynamic information to serve people effectively","Impact":"Inefficient or ineffective operation of smart buildings and robots, potential for increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Develop semantic-aware and dynamics-aware modeling techniques, integrate disparate sensor data for analysis and decision making","Technologies":"IoT sensors, spatial mapping technology, data integration platforms","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building management companies, technology developers"}]}
